headline: $132.95 Bn Building Automation System Market - Global Forecasts from 2025 to 2030
summary: The Building Automation System Market is poised for significant growth, with a projected CAGR of 7.89%, reaching USD 132.95 billion by 2030 from USD 90.95 billion in 2025. This comprehensive market report provides in-depth analysis, covering consumer demand across residential, commercial, and industrial sectors, alongside trends in technology, regulatory frameworks, and macroeconomic influences. Key players include ABB, Honeywell, Siemens, and more. The report offers strategic insights on market
